Email: patilrahul310@gmail.com             Rahul PatilNorth Wales, PA
Ph: 847-246-2899                         Infosys Limited – Technology Lead/Senior Consultant
SUMMARY
Rahul Patil is part of Healthcare Consulting Practice unit at Infosys Limited (Domain Consulting Group) that 
specializes in Business Process Analysis, Health Care Domain Consulting, Business Consulting and Scrum 
Master  role.  He  is  part  of  Infosys  limited  from  last  13.5+  years  and  has  a  strong  experience  in  the 
Information  Technology  industry  working  as  Product  Owner,  Scrum  Master,  Technical  Business  Analyst, 
Technical   Process/Business   Consultant,   and   Application   Developer   with   in-depth   knowledge   and 
understanding  of  Business  Requirement  Gathering,  Business  Process  Flow  and  Modeling,  Requirement 
Engineering, Solution Designing and development.
During his career at Infosys Limited he has worked with various Insurance clients like Healthcare Insurance

Engineering, Solution Designing and development.
During his career at Infosys Limited he has worked with various Insurance clients like Healthcare Insurance 
(Anthem and CVS Health - Aetna Inc.), Property & Casualty (Allstate Inc.) and Mortgage Insurance (Arch 
MI).  He  has  strong  exposure  to  different  software  development  methodologies  like  SDLC,  AGILE  (Scrum 
Framework),  SAFe  and  is  proficient  at  clarifying  and  writing  Business  and  Technical  requirements, 
performing  gap  analysis,  documentation  of  functional  specifications,  Data  Mapping,  Creating  Logical 
mapping  document,  Writing  User  stories  and  Acceptance  Criteria,  Conducting  grooming  and  Refinement 
sessions.
Extensive experience of Enterprise integration projects for working on API’s.Worked closely with Architects 
in defining the Orchestrations, data model and creating the solutions for various transactions on Digital and 
Next Generation platform.
Domain Expertise

in defining the Orchestrations, data model and creating the solutions for various transactions on Digital and 
Next Generation platform.
Domain Expertise
1.  Worked on various domains in Healthcare Industry performing the role of Business system Analyst, 
Product Owner and Scrum Master.
2.  Worked on Claims (837), Providers, Billing, ESDS, EDI gateway, Enterprise Integrations API's and 
applications with majority of experience in Claims Intake, Ingestion, extraction and adjudication.
3.  Business  Analyst  experience  implementing  solutions  using,  Microservices,  MQ  series,  XML,  API's, 
APIC's.
4.  Strong  experience  of  working  with  architecture  team  for  creation  of  Orchestration  of  a  new 
API/application/IIB flow to be build.
5.  In-dept  knowledge  of  architectural  framework  and  design  principles  of  Microservices  and  SOA  in 
Enterprise Integration Ecosystem.

API/application/IIB flow to be build.

process  and  provided  coaching  and  training  at  the  team  and  department  levels  to  maximize  its 
benefits.
7.  Certifications: 
    Certified SAFe 5 Agilist 
    Certified SAFe 5.1 POPM (Product Owner/Product Manager).
    Certified Scrum Master from Scrum Alliance.
    Certified Salesforce Administrator.
    Certified AHIP Part A and Part B.
    Infosys Global Agile Certified.

Technical Expertise
1.  Product owner experience for Claims platform under Enterprise Integration.
2.  Business Analyst experience for applications developed in IIB (IBM integration bus), WTX, COBOL.
3.  Worked as Technical Business analyst for various transactions like Claims (837 and paper) , Claim 
status  Inquiry  (276/277)  ,  Referrals  (278),  Pre-Cert  (278)  ,  Real  time  eligibility(270/271),  834 
member enrollment, 277 CA , 835 (Remittance and EOB).
4.  Sound  Knowledge  of  SOA,  Web  Services,  API's,  EDI,  837  files,  XML,  SOAP  UI,  COBOL,  JCL,  DB2, 
SQL, Visio, UML, Use Cases, business process, Data Mapping and Modelling.
5.  Demonstrated innovation ideas to generate cost improvements and modernization techniques.
6.  Vast experience of Health rules payor and Health edge suit of product (Claim Adjudication system).
7.  Extensive  experience  of  working  on  Health  edge  product  -  HRP  connector  services  HRP  Payor 
platform, Heath Rules Manager.

7.  Extensive  experience  of  working  on  Health  edge  product  -  HRP  connector  services  HRP  Payor

Provider Data Management, Claims Intake and Adjudication.

Professional Experience
CVS Health, Aetna, Blue Bell PA                                                     (Aug 2015 –Present)
Aetna Enterprise Integrations- Claims Intake/Ingestion/Extraction, Next Gen Platform

Role: Product Owner 
This  is  a  project  Medicare  Next  Generation  under  EI  (Enterprise  Integration)  Medicare  Next  Generation 
platform. Project involves integration, application development and end to end testing of functionality for 
various Health care related transactions for Medicare members enrolled on this Next generation platform.  
Claims  Intake  and  ingestion  development  and  enhancement  involves  integrating  Enterprise  Integration 
Engine  application  with  HRP  (Health  Edge)  adjudication  platform  for  Claims  adjudication  and  payment 
processing. Referral ADD, Inquiry and Claim Status Inquiry are the processes developed and created for 
Medicare  Next  generation  members  to  add  and  inquire  on  the  Referrals  and  check  on  the  claim  status. 
Project  also  involves  changes  to  EDI  transactions  like  Claims  (837  and  paper),  Claim  status        Inquiry 
(270/271), Referrals (278), Pre-Cert, Real time eligibility (270/271).

Project  also  involves  changes  to  EDI  transactions  like  Claims  (837  and  paper),  Claim  status        Inquiry 
(270/271), Referrals (278), Pre-Cert, Real time eligibility (270/271).
Project involves integration of EI (Enterprise Integration) application with different other applications like 
EDI, Member, Plan, ODM (Rule Engine) and HRP (Health Rules Payor).
Responsibilities:
    Providing the Domain and Technical expertise to develop and integrate with Health Rules Payor 
Product for Claims Intake, Claims Ingestion and extraction, Accumulator exchange process, Member 
and Provider Explanation of Benefits (EOB) generation and Payment processing for members enrolled 
on Medicare Next Gen (HRP) platform. 
    Doing the required analysis of REST Webservices exposed by HRP through SOAP UI with different data 
and scenarios. 
    Detail Requirements grooming, Analysis and solutioning of applications and Microservices using IBM

and scenarios. 
    Detail Requirements grooming, Analysis and solutioning of applications and Microservices using IBM 
Integration BUS, Application programing interface, IBM WebSphere MQ, and APIc (API Gateway). 
    Requirements, Analysis for various Healthcare EDI transactions like Claims (837 and paper), Claim 
status Inquiry (276/277), Referrals (278), Pre-Cert (278), Real time eligibility (270/271), 834 Member 
enrollment, 277 CA, 835 (Remittance and EOB). 
    Creating user stories, technical stories and defining the acceptance criteria for them in RTC tool. 
Creating logical and business data mapping, Technical and business specification documents. 
    Responsible for conducting business and technical grooming sessions with Solution and Integration 
architect and business stakeholders.
    Evaluate and adapt the changes in Health Care Industry for any Federal, State, and Compliance 
related mitigations, Risk and Re-Insurance corridor for CMS.

architect and business stakeholders.
    Evaluate and adapt the changes in Health Care Industry for any Federal, State, and Compliance 
related mitigations, Risk and Re-Insurance corridor for CMS.
    Create and Execute the Strategy for Migration of Data from Legacy systems to HRP platform. 
    Interact with Business and Program Management to help define the Project scope through Program 
Increment Planning sessions, and help defining the requirements through JAD (Joint Application 
Development) sessions. Working with Data Modelers, Solution Architects and Application Architects to 
prepare the Use cases, Data Flow Diagrams/Orchestration, As-is, As was and To be Process flows for 
various REST API’s or Webservices. 
    Conducting Data Analysis and Data Referential Integrity Analysis for different Data sources and 
transactions like Member Enrollment, Claim Processing, Referrals, Pre-Certifications, Real time 
Eligibility.

transactions like Member Enrollment, Claim Processing, Referrals, Pre-Certifications, Real time 
Eligibility. 
    Participate, Conduct and provide valuable inputs in Program Increment planning and Agile ceremonies 
like Sprint Planning, Sprint Demos, Daily stand up and Retrospective meetings. 
    Contribute on creation Product Vision, Roadmap and PI Objectives during PI planning sessions. Work 
closing with Product Manager on decomposing EPICs in feature which can be consumed and completed 
in a particular PI.
    Contribute and work with program Management for defining the business features, Resource planning 
and management and execute the project using SAFe (Scaled Agile Framework).
    Mentoring the team members on SAFe Agile and Lean Agile Frameworks.

    Review and guide testing (QA) team for test scripts, test scenarios and test data preparation. Removed 
team impediments each day to allow team to deliver sprint goals.  
Arch MI, Walnut Creek, CA                                                     (Feb 2015 –July2015)
Role: Business System Analyst. 
This  project  was  a  middle  tier  application  which  involved  Web  Service  calls  for  getting  the  required 
information  and  sending  the  details  to  consumer.  It  Provided  integration  of  various  forms  of  Industry 
standard  data  formats  such  as  EDI,  MISMO  XML,  Quickendu  etc.  Project  involved  integration  of  various 
system and applications like Cyclone, WESB and OPUS. As Business Analyst worked on creating new logical 
mapping documents and defining business rules after gathering the business requirements and needs.
Worked on analyzing the existing XSD to identify parent child relationship and provide inputs to business

Worked on analyzing the existing XSD to identify parent child relationship and provide inputs to business 
and technical owners where addition of new fields can be done. Validated the XML files for correctness of 
data. 
Responsibilities:
    Engaged in different phases of the project lifecycle facilitating and leading meetings/ JAD sessions with 
various Business stakeholders.
    Provided support through all the phases of the project and created several artifacts.
    Created UML diagrams.
    Evaluate the conceptual scope, break it into components to distinguish critical and non-critical business 
requirements.
Allstate Inc, Northbrook, IL                                                     (July 2014 –Feb2015)
Role: Business Analyst. 
This project involved enhancement of Billing application. Worked as Business Analyst for various projects 
like E-Bill, E-Check and E-Refund.
Responsibilities:
    Organize JAD sessions to capture the High Level and detail Requirements.

like E-Bill, E-Check and E-Refund.

    Create Application-Level Design documents.

    Developed and maintained the Requirement Traceability Matrix.
    Explaining the business requirements to Development and QA teams and resolving their queries during 
analysis, development and throughout the project life cycle.

    Organized meetings to discuss outstanding issues with QA and developers.

CVS Health, Aetna, Pune, INDIA                                                     (Aug 2012 –July 2014)
Role: Technology Lead/Analyst. 
This Project was a middle tier application which involved fetching data from various backend systems like 
Data migrator, EPDB and DB2 tables. Project involved Service oriented Architecture and involved COBOL 
modules for filtering the data and returning back to calling consumers like Navigator, RTE, Aeppays, CATS, 
KANA after applying business rules and validations. His responsibilities involved thoroughly understanding 
the business & functional requirements, reviewer for reviewing design, code & unit test results created by 
team.
Responsibilities:
    Identify system integration requirements.
    Lead a team of 15 members.
    Develop and Review of Code and design.
    Review Test Plans and Test scripts.
    Estimate the efforts and create milestones.
    Perform System Test and Integration test.
    Defect analysis, Tracking and reporting.

    Review Test Plans and Test scripts.

    Defect analysis, Tracking and reporting.
    Organize Defect Triage meetings.
Anthem Inc, Pune, INDIA                                                     (June 2009 –July 2012)
Role: Senior Software Engineer 
This project involved modules for claims adjudication. Worked on modules for Claims subsystems like Edit 
subsystem, Eligibility, Adjudication and Output.  Gained strong knowledge for different types of claims like 
Medicare, Medicaid, OON and Inn network claims.
Responsibilities:
    Analysis, design, development, integration and implementation of business solutions throughout entire 
Software Development Life Cycle (SDLC).
    Functional Requirement Analysis. 
    Create Detailed System Design Documentation and coded the modules.
    Create System Test strategy and Integration Test strategy.
